name: La 'Rona: Safe
description: As the pandemic wore on, the question of what it means to feel "safe" came up. When I was a child, I used to have night terrors. I would wake up in the middle of the night scared out of my wits. Sometimes I would hallucinate that the room was growing suddenly enormous, which would scare me even more. Then I had an idea. If I imagined myself as this little mouse, cozy and warm in her little mouse bed under a little quilt, sleeping in her little mouse room, I wasn't as scared. I imagined this scene many times to comfort myself.
